snippet: The Department of Defense has identified 2,305 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations. It recently confirmed the deaths of three Americans.
abstract: Defense Department confirms deaths of three American service members in Afghanistan.
lead_paragraph: The Department of Defense has identified 2,305 American service members who have died as a part of the Afghan war and related operations. It recently confirmed the deaths of three Americans.

keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces
